long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bwoah - Your F1 Homepage: Welcome to Bwoah, the ultimate destination for Formula 1 enthusiasts. This extension transforms your new tab page into a comprehensive F1 hub, providing up-to-date race schedules, leaderboards, and exclusive F1 images. 

Key Features:
1. Real-Time Updates: Stay informed with the latest race schedules and detailed race analysis.
2. Drivers and Teams Leaderboards: Access current standings and performance stats for your favorite drivers and teams.
3. Exclusive F1 Images: Enjoy a rotating selection of high-quality F1 images every time you open a new tab.
4. Race Schedule: Never miss a race with our detailed schedule, including session times and local time conversions.
5. Track Details: Get in-depth information about each race track, including circuit length, lap records, and more.
6. Community Engagement: Join a community of passionate F1 fans and share your excitement for the sport.
7. Quick Access Buttons: Easily navigate to F1 news, official websites, and other related resources with our intuitive button layout.

Why Install Bwoah?
- Stay Updated: With real-time updates and comprehensive race coverage, you'll always be in the know.
- Enhance Your F1 Experience**: Dive deeper into the world of F1 with detailed stats, images, and track information.
- Convenience: All the information you need is just a new tab away, making it easier than ever to stay connected to the sport you love.
